definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Kavarna is a real-life city built on rock'n'roll.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦爾納是建在搖滾樂上的富有生氣的城市。

sentences.english: The highest varna is the Brahmin , the priests and scholars .
sentences.chinese: 最高瓦爾納是婆羅門，牧師和學者。

sentences.english: But the old man is accurate enough in his appraisal of Varna.
sentences.chinese: 但老人在他的準確評價瓦爾納不夠。

sentences.english: But first there is Varna to discover.
sentences.chinese: 但是，先要探索一番的還是瓦爾納。

sentences.english: You may also consider Varna Airport.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以考慮瓦爾納機場。

sentences.english: The yacht came into the Bay of Douarnenez.
sentences.chinese: 遊艇進入杜瓦爾納內茲海灣。
